app.description: Convert the names of the chromosomes in a VCF file.

option.name: ignore_if_no_mapping
option.description: if no mapping found, skip that record.

option.name: use_original_chrom_name_if_no_mapping
option.description: if no mapping found, use the original name instead of throwing an error

option.name: mappingFile
option.description: load a custom name mapping. Format (chrom-source\tchrom-dest\n)+
